---
title: "Understand half-sibling misspecification"
---

**Understand half-sibling misspecification** is a pdf vignette. At present,
pkgdown (the R package used to create this website) does not support pdf
vignettes; see [pkgdown issue 781](https://github.com/r-lib/pkgdown/issues/781).
Please access **Understand half-sibling misspecification** by installing Pv3Rs 
and calling `vignette(topic = "understand-half-sibs", package = "Pv3Rs")` in R.
